attributes.action: Make Websites Not Charge To See a Job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see companys that dont charge to advertise a job on there website, But they will charge Customers to look at it. In this current climate all the jobs should be widely availible for free, To stop unemployment. There are a few that i can name.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
